title: Help
body: im at 99 lp and im wondering oif i can get one more so i dont have to play a game to get one lp

replies.body: Adjusting LP is not something that is provided.  We don't want to skew anything, and it would be contrary to the competitive nature of the game.  Though we can't assist with this, I wish you all the best in your next game and getting into a series!
..... play another game. Try another game mode.
